name: Will You Snail: Day One - UNFINISHED Demo (WYS Fan-game)
name_original: Will You Snail: Day One - UNFINISHED Demo (WYS Fan-game)
description:
You might want to fullscreen the game. Anyone know how to fix the screen being to small in Construct3? I'm new, sorry. :P

This isn't even a finished DEMO!

This is the demo, but it's not finished yet. I will be updating this page as development continues to people can give feedback and stuff. There's only three levels, one of which is the "final boss."

Ever since I saw Jonas Tyroller's first Will You Snail devlog, I wondered what it would be like to play the prototype from day one of development... So I recreated it. Then that little prototype got a little attention, so I decided to make it into a "full" release.
